extensionDescription.message: Integreiddio VPN i Firefox: Eithrio Tabiau, gosod lleoliadau Gwefan a mwy!

back.description: Alternative text attribute for back button.

titleServerList.description: Title for a dialog where users can set the location for a website.

titlePageSettings.message: Dewisiadau ar gyfer y wefan hon
titlePageSettings.description: The header for website specific settings, i.e. exclude a page from VPN.

excludePageFor.message: Diffoddwch ddiogelu VPN bob tro ar gyfer $ORIGIN$
excludePageFor.description: Setting to exclude a website from VPN.

resetPageSettings.description: Button text to reset all site specific settings.

vpnIsOn.message: Mae diogelu VPN ar gyfer Firefox ymlaen
vpnIsOn.description: Header to signal that VPN connection is enabled.

vpnIsOff.message: Mae diogelu VPN ar gyfer Firefox wedi'i ddiffodd
vpnIsOff.description: Header to signal that VPN connection is disabled.

extensionVpnIsOff.message: Mae Mozilla VPN ymlaen o hyd, gan ddiogelu gweddill eich cyfrifiadur.
extensionVpnIsOff.description: Popup subtitle when the extension VPN is off, but the client VPN is on.

vpnOffStatus.description: Label indicating that the VPN is off.

vpnOnStatus.description: Label indicating that the VPN is on.

placeholderSearchWebsites.description: Placeholder text for the search input field to search websites.

tableHeadingWebsite.description: Table heading for the column listing websites.

tableHeadingVpnStatus.description: Table heading for the column indicating whether the VPN is on or off for a website.

headlineNoWebsitePreferences.message: Nid ydych wedi gosod unrhyw ddewisiadau gwefan eto
headlineNoWebsitePreferences.description: Headline shown when the user hasn’t set any website preferences.

noWebsitePreferencesSubText.message: Gyda'r estyniad Firefox, gallwch chi ddiffodd amddiffyniad Mozilla VPN ar gyfer gwefan neu osod lleoliad cyfaddas. I wneud hyn, ewch i wefan, agorwch yr estyniad, a diweddarwch ddewisiadau'r wefan.
noWebsitePreferencesSubText.description: Subtext shown when there are no website preferences set by the user.

altTextRemoveWebsiteButton.description: Alternative text for the button that removes a website rule from the list of preferences.

altTextOpenSettingsPage.description: Alternative text for the button that opens the Extensions Settings page.

searchServer.description: Placeholder for the Input field where users can search the list of servers.

bodySubscribeNow.message: Mae'n edrych fel nad ydych chi wedi tanysgrifio i Mozilla VPN eto. I ddefnyddio'r estyniad hwn, tanysgrifiwch.
bodySubscribeNow.description: Body of an error message, shown if the user is trying to use the extension without a subscription.

btnSubscribeNow.description: Call to action button for users to subscribe to Mozilla VPN.

getHelp.description: Text of a link pointing to a relevant help page.

bodySignedOut.message: Rydych chi wedi allgofnodi o ap Mozilla VPN ar hyn o bryd. I ddefnyddio estyniad Mozilla VPN Firefox, agorwch yr ap ar eich cyfrifiadur a mewngofnodwch i'ch cyfrif.

headerNeedsUpdate.description: This is the headline of an error panel.

bodyNeedsUpdate.message: Er mwyn defnyddio'r estyniad hwn, rhaid i chi gael y rhaglen Mozilla VPN diweddaraf wedi'i osod.
bodyNeedsUpdate.description: This is the body copy for an error panel.

headerInstallMsg.description: Header if a VPN installation was not found.

bodyOpenMsg.message: I ddefnyddio estyniad Mozilla VPN Firefox, agorwch ap Mozilla VPN yn gyntaf.

bodyInstallMsg.message: I ddefnyddio'r estyniad hwn, yn gyntaf llwythwch a gosodwch ap Mozilla VPN ar eich cyfrifiadur.

bodyInstallMsgFooter.message: Sylwch fod Mozilla VPN yn wasanaeth tanysgrifio taledig.

btnDownloadNow.description: This is a call to action button to download the VPN.

useDefaultLocationExplainer.message: Defnyddiwch yr un lleoliad â'r ap Mozilla VPN sy'n diogelu'r cyfrifiadur hwn.
useDefaultLocationExplainer.description: Explanation of what “Use default Mozilla VPN Location” means.

bodyUnsupportedOSMessage.message: Ar hyn o bryd, dim ond ar ddyfeisiau Windows y mae estyniad Mozilla VPN ar gael.

footnoteUnsupportedOSMessage.message: Rydyn ni'n gweithio i ddod â chefnogaeth i macOS a Linux cyn hir!

websiteProtection.description: A subtitle that is followed by an off icon and the word 'Off'.

learnMore.description: Label of link that leads to SUMO.

onboarding1_title.message: Diffoddwch VPN ar gyfer gwefannau penodol

onboarding1_body.message: Gyda'r estyniad Firefox, gallwch chi ddiffodd ddiogelu VPN ar gyfer gwefannau penodol, tra'n ei gadw ymlaen ar gyfer popeth arall.

onboarding2_title.message: Gweld gwahanol wefannau o wahanol leoliadau

onboarding2_body.message: Newyddion o Lundain. Chwaraeon o Sao Paulo. Siopa o Tokyo. Gosodwch leoliadau gwefan-benodol ar gyfer pori personol.

onboarding3_body.message: Defnyddiwch yr estyniad i droi diogelu VPN ymlaen ar gyfer Firefox - hyd yn oed pan fydd diogelu i ffwrdd ar gyfer gweddill eich cyfrifiadur.

next.description: Label of button to progress to next onboarding panel.

skip.description: Label of button to skip onboarding.

done.description: Label of button in final onboarding panel.

headerReEnableFirefoxProtection.description: Error panel title for when Firefox is an excluded app.

bodyReEnableFirefoxProtection.message: Ar hyn o bryd mae Firefox yn “ap gwaharddedig” yn rhaglen Mozilla VPN. I ddefnyddio'r estyniad hwn, agorwch y rhaglen ac ewch i Gosodiadau > Apiau Eithriedig a thynnu Firefox.

settingsPageSubtitle.message: I ychwanegu neu newid dewisiadau gwefan-benodol, ewch i'r wefan ac agorwch estyniad Mozilla VPN Firefox. Yna, gosodwch y dewisiadau ar gyfer y wefan. Dim ond pan fydd diogelu VPN ar gyfer Firefox ymlaen y bydd eich dewisiadau'n dod i rym.

noSignal.description: Indicator text describing the status of the VPN.

unstable.description: Indicator text describing the status of the VPN.

connecting.description: Indicator text describing the status of the VPN.

offForWebsite.message: Mozilla VPN wedi'i ddiffodd ar gyfer gwefan

websiteLocationLabel.description: Aria label for a flag icon representing the location of the VPN server

alert_conflictingProgram.message: Gall rhaglen ar eich cyfrifiadur fod yn achosi problemau gydag estyniad Mozilla VPN.

alert_conflictingExtensions.message: Gall estyniadau eraill fod yn ymyrryd â sut mae estyniad Mozilla VPN yn gweithio.
